snippet.title: The M/G/1 retrial queue : an information theoretic approach (p. 119-137)
snippet.description: The M/G/1 retrial queue : an information theoretic approach (p. 119-137) / Artalejo, Jesús R. ; López Herrero, M. J. ; Universidad Complutense de Madrid In this paper, we give a survey of the use of information theoretic techniques for the estimation of the main performance characteristics of the M/G/1 retrial queue. We focus on the limiting distribution of the system state, the length of a busy period and the waiting time. [...] to illustrate the accuracy of the maximum entropy estimations when they are compared versus the classical solutions. 2005 SORT : statistics and operations research transactions, Vol. 29, Núm. 1 (2005) , p. 119-138 ; UAB restricted access
